article_title: Bernard Schoenburg: Budget in limbo, but candidates to file

article_metadata.description: In this particularly weird political year in Illinois, candidates for offices including state House and Senate will file for office beginning Monday, with State Board of Elections employees entering candidate data on new computers for which the state hasn't paid."We were able to get a sufficient number of computers from a vendor who is still supplying them with the expectation, of course, they'll get paid when we get a budget," said STEVE SANDVOSS, executive director of the board.Sandvoss said
article_metadata.author: Bernard Schoenburg
